Key: If I were to pick... I guess it'd be Miku...
Hehehe. Darling, I'm so happy!
Upset. Shido is going to choose Miku.

That is one foolish decision, Shido! How dare
you fall for the forbidden fruit...
Uh, it's not like that...
Shido! You date me! Date! Date!

I don't understand, Shido. You're my boyfriend,
so you should date me.
Crap... We're circling back to square one...

(I know! At a time like this... I'm going to have
to call the Fraxinus for help...)

(Whenever I run into issues, they always give me
some pointers or instructions. They should be
able to save me from this situation...!)
Oh, you seem to be in trouble, Shido.
Perfect timing, Kotori.

(My little sister Kotori is the Commander of the
Fraxinus. She should be a dependable advisor at
a time like this... I think.)
Can you solve this problem for me?
Hmm. The girls in front of you, aside from\nOrigami, may possibly go berserk if you\nhurt them carelessly. You know that, right?
I know that. That's why I'm struggling.
And you're going to choose Miku, knowing\nthat?

Yeah. I've known Miku for the least amount of
time. So I figured she might be the most
unstable.
I see. Well, surprisingly, it looks like you've\nthought it through for once. Then you do that.\nI'll handle the others.
Got it, thanks.
All right Miku, let's run.
Aww, darling. You're so aggressive.
(We held each others' hands and ran for it.)
Hehe. Where do you want to go, darling?
H-Hm... Anyways, Miku.
What is it, darling?
You just started your career as an idol, right?
Yes～ It's all thanks to you, darling.

(Miku used to be an idol, but got dragged into
trouble and lost her voice.)

(After she overcame it with the power of the
Spirit, she uses her vocal abilities to do as she
pleases, but...)

Darling, you said you'd be my fan no matter
what, so I decided to try again.

(...Well, that's her understanding of the
events.)

So that means you must be pretty busy, right?
Are you okay to kill time here?

(She's a year older and goes to a different
school, but she always finds a reason to come
visit me.)

(Miku is currently a student and an idol. She
has to be busy...)

I have today off, so it's all good. Hehe, you're
so kind, darling.
O-Okay... I guess that's all that matters.

(If she was busy, I thought I'd be freed... but
I'll keep that to myself.)
Uh... Let's see. Date... huh?
Yes. I want to walk with you.
All right, then let's walk around.
Hehe, today is such a nice day!

Y-Yeah. But I feel like people are watching
us...
You think so?
Isn't that Miku Izayoi?
What? No way. There's no way she'd be here.

U-Uh maybe we shouldn't be out in public.
You're pretty famous...
What, no I'm not～ I'm not quite there yet～
...Wait a minute!
What is it, darling?
Th-That billboard. O-Of course you're famous!
Haha, you're right. That is me.

If we're walking right by it, it's obvious that
it's you.
Who cares if people find out? I don't mind.
You should! You're an idol!

I may be an idol, but more than that, I'm your
Miku♪
Uoooo! Isn't that Miku-tan?
What? Miku-tan is with some guy. Who is that?
C-Crap! This isn't good!

It's fine. They wouldn't think the real deal
would be here.

Even if you're okay with it, I'm not! I sense
danger!
Aww, really?
Of course! Anyways, we should...

Then, do you want to leave? I'm fine anywhere,
as long as it's with you.
What's up with that guy? All close to Miku-tan.
A man for Miku-tan?! Ahhhh, it's all over!
Crap, Miku! Let's run!
Huh? Running again?

(And so we ran—seriously, literally ran through
our date.)
